Address.label: Address
Address.value: THE SEAPORT,199 WATER STREET,28TH FLOOR, NEW YORK, New York, 10038, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Seaport Entertainment Group, Inc. engages in the provision of restaurant, retail and leisure services. It operates through the following segments: Landlord Operations, Hospitality, and Sponsorships, Events and Entertainment. The Landlord Operations segment refers to the operation of physical real estate assets. The Hospitality segment focuses on food and beverage operating businesses. The Sponsorships, Events and Entertainment segment consists of the Las Vegas Aviators, the Las Vegas Ballpark, the Fashion Show Mall Air Rights, Seaport events and concerts, and sponsorship agreements.
